title: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142 - No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant), the following message is displayed: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant''.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project. Additionally, I would like clarification on the meaning of the message.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open a binary project (e.g., org.apache.ant). 2. Attempt to view the scoped type hierarchy. 3. Observe the 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'' message.
